purchase-section.title: Protocol owned DEX liquidity module
purchase-section.description:
Sell GEISTFTM LP tokens directly to the protocol for a 10% premium.

 50% of the FTM treasury rewards (earned from borrowing fees) are redirected to purchasenthese LP tokens which are locked forever, ensuring healthy ongoing liquidity for the protocol.
